    • Field Detail

      • clientBuilder

        protected org.fcrepo.client.FcrepoClient.FcrepoClientBuilder clientBuilder

      • importContainerDirectory

        protected File importContainerDirectory
        A directory within the metadata directory that serves as the root of the resource being imported. If the export directory contains /fcrepo/rest/one/two/three and we're importing the resource at /fcrepo/rest/one/two, this stores that path.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Importer

        public Importer(Config config,
                org.fcrepo.client.FcrepoClient.FcrepoClientBuilder clientBuilder)

        Parameters:
        config - for import
        clientBuilder - for sending resources to Fedora

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This method does the import
        Specified by:
        run in interface TransferProcess

      • findRepositoryRoot

        public URI findRepositoryRoot(URI uri)
        Method to find and set the repository root from the resource uri. Note: This method is public to allow access for testing purposes.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI for the resource
        Returns:
        The URI of the repository root, or the URI with path removed if neither the URI nor none of its parent paths declare themselves fedora:RepositoryRoot.
